description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.5M
  in 2019-2020 on contracts with Brian G Innes Schouten Excavating. The average
  contract duration was 0.42 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $954.7K. The longest
  contract was 1.16 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.8M.
lookup_name: 'BRIAN G INNES SCHOUTEN EXCAVATING'

s431_number_of_contracts: '3'

s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '33%'

s424_mean_duration: '0.42'
s421_mean_contract_value: '954.7K'
s425_max_duration: '1.16'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.8M'
